name: Kung-fu Bruce: The Legend Continues
description:
Unofficial sequel of legendary ZX Spectrum game.

-Collect all evil's lanterns
-Fight the evil wizard fighters
-Destroy the evil wizard

-5 levels
-1 Boss level
-Classic opponents: Ninja and Green Yamo
-Green Yamo can jump now
-2 new opponents: Nunchaku-man and Shuriken-man
